    # Function to check if the dishwasher is open
    symbol open_dishwasher=open(dishwasher)
    return open_dishwasher

    body:
        if is_dishwasher_open(dishwasher):
            achieve_once inhand(soap)
            achieve inside(soap, dishwasher)
        else:

            achieve_once inhand(soap)
            achieve inside(soap, dishwasher)
            achieve closed(dishwasher)

    return soap_nearby
